夜间锻炼可改善超重成年人的血糖控制研究人员探讨了身体活动时间的差异及其对血糖水平和代谢功能的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Exercising-at-night-improves-glucose-control-in-overweight-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Exercising-at-night-improves-glucose-control-in-overweight-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f111bb10-5ee1-4681-87de-c4cdc3445a6b Thu, 20 Jun 2024 08:28:00 -0400 Exercising at night improves glucose control in overweight adults

大多数美国人认为，事后看来，阻止 COVID-19 传播的几项关键政策总体上是个好主意哈佛大学陈曾熙公共卫生学院和德博蒙特基金会公布了一项全国民意调查的结果，该民意调查旨在了解公众对 COVID-19 大流行相关政策的看法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Several-key-policies-to-stop-the-spread-of-COVID-19-were-generally-a-good-idea-in-hindsight-根据大多数美国人的说法.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Several-key-policies-to-stop-the-spread-of-COVID-19-were-generally-a-good-idea-in-hindsight-根据大多数美国人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16038497-1bdf-4dba-a06f-ec030d39809a Thu, 20 Jun 2024 06:55:00 -0400 Several key policies to stop the spread of COVID-19 were generally a good idea in hindsight according to majority of Americans

Stilla Technologies 通过与 Avantor 的战略分销关系扩大美国业务，并推出先进的内容产品Stilla 是基因组学和数字 PCR 领域的先驱，很高兴地宣布通过与生命科学和先进技术解决方案领域的全球领导者 Avantor 建立战略分销关系，在美国进行扩张。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Stilla-Technologies-expands-US-Presence-through-strategic-distribution-relationship-with-Avantor-and-introduces-advanced-content-offerings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240620/Stilla-Technologies-expands-US-Presence-through-strategic-distribution-relationship-with-Avantor-and-introduces-advanced-content-offerings.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67b7d6bb-a646-45ab-9802-956e906769ce Thu, 20 Jun 2024 05:06:00 -0400 Stilla Technologies expands U.S. presence through strategic distribution relationship with Avantor and introduces advanced content offerings
